0: Just got back from there for my wifes birthday it is a beautiful place with a great location where one of the best beaches in PR are
Hotel was great pool near the ocean is fun and has a DJ on the weekends
They have beach and attendants and waitress staff and pool and beach
Directly on the beach awesome pool with music multiple resturants within the hotel located right on the strip
The staff helping during the day by the pool and beach were also very attentive and kind
Beach access pool area proximity to shops and entertainment Best places to eat are local restaurants like Mi Casita Metropol Ediths Cafe
He personally escorted us to our Ocean Villa and made sure we were comfortable
it is a great plus that there is so much seating out by the pool and easy access to the beach
1: We recently stayed in an Ocean Villa for 4 nights after the renovation
All the renovations are really nice but be forewarned the cabanas between the pool and ocean are no longer free
My Wife and I stayed in one of the beach villas for a long weekend in late Feb and we could not have been happier
He was open and honest about the noise issue from the start which I appreciated very much and he upgraded us to an ocean view room
They gave free lunch comped us the resort fee and moved us to a more ocean view room
Indeed protestors continue on the beach as I type this
The last two days they moved to the beach and the pool area
Beach was clean but the water was full of seaweed

And there is a union protesting the hotel at the front entrance and on the beach which means you have people yelling singing talking through megaphones all day every day you can hear them from your rooms the pool the beach
When we needed water and towels they gave them with a smile This nearby restaurant served delicious and affordable typical Puerto Rican food Beaches were not that great
2: By Friday there were attendants getting drinks on the beach
Every morning when I would go get my coffee people are busy cleaning the pools getting the beach readyect
We went down to have breakfast and came back from the pool beach around 130 and our room was not cleaned
My husband and I did one of the beach body boot camps taught by Luiz
There were lots of available chairs either pool side or at the beach
However the view of the ocean was the bare minimum
Note since we do not live by the ocean waking up to an ocean view is essential when we travel to beach destinations and stay at hotels on the beach
We were extremely disappointed with our “ ocean view room ” upon checking in
They do massages at the beach and they have activities jet skiing banana boat
I paid over 20 to have a ocean villa
